Instruction: Trim the ends of the green beans.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
Add the green beans to the skillet and sauté for 4-5 minutes, or until crisp-tender.
Stir in lemon zest and lemon juice. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Remove from heat and serve immediately as a vibrant and tangy side dish.
